name: 'Til Death Do Us Part
description:
Looks like you accidentally cast a spell to revive all of your past husbands! Now you have to run around and dodge all of their attacks until the spell wears off.

get it? cuz they're "joined to get her"?

we're funny we swear

You can also fight these ghoulish grooms, but your former attachment to them has made your souls linked! If a zombie dies, by your hand or otherwise, your max health will decrease, so make wise choices about whether you'll fight your formerly flirtatious foes, or keep them alive at all costs.

game stinks lmao
